actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to provide that for purposes of section 165 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 losses from Dutch Elm disease shall be treated as casualty losses.

summary.text: Requires the treatment of property losses resulting from Dutch Elm disease as casualty losses for deductions from gross income with respect to the individual income tax under the Internal Revenue Code.

titles.title: A bill to provide that for purposes of section 165 of the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 losses from Dutch Elm disease shall be treated as casualty losses.
